title: 72.2P Land for Sale In Administrative City of Galle, Labuduwa
details:
•Our Reference No. SL 8530
(Please quote this reference number when inquiring.)

• Land Extent - 72.2P
• Price per perch- Rs.275,000/-
• Access Road Width - 20ft
• Road Condition - Concrete
• Soil Condition - Natural
• Application - Residencial , Commercial
• Distance to Main road - 600m
•The land is in a small hillock which is 110 feet from the sea level
• Can see the Rumassala, and sea horizon from this land which has a 360 degree view
• Including a proposed plan to have few chalet/duplex/studio type of accommodation for rental purpose

• 2 km to Karapitiya Hospital. Super Markets, Banks, ATMs, Schools.
• 6 km to Unawatuna Beach
• 7 km to Hiyare Bio Diversity Nature Reserve
• 1 - 1 1/2 hr drive to Sinharaja Forest from Deniyaya side
• 15 minutes to the land from the High Way Exit

• NB: Price quoted is as indicated by the owner. Genuine buyers are encouraged and invited to make reasonable offers after inspection irrespective of the price quoted.

We possess a large database of residential lands & houses in good neighborhoods in Colombo & suburbs. Please feel free to let us know your requirement. If this property does not meet with your needs, we are happy to help you choose the best.
